alert.note: Alert for Mississippi; New Madrid; Scott; Stoddard (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 1:55AM CDT until August 03 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI...SOUTHWESTERN SCOTT...NORTHEASTERN NEW MADRID AND EASTERN STODDARD COUNTIES... At 155 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bloomfield, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sikeston, Dexter, Charleston, East Prairie, Bloomfield, Miner, Morehouse, Bertrand, Matthews, Essex, Bell City, Canalou, Anniston, Vanduser, Baker and Penermon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 1 and 9. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 55 and 73. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
